_comment: Team Configuration File - Customize this file for your team
_documentation: This file contains all team-specific settings for the GameTime application. Modify the values below to customize the app for your team.

team._description: Basic team information and naming conventions
team.name: Your Team Name

_notes.name: Full team name displayed throughout the application
_notes.shortName: Abbreviated team name for compact displays
_notes.defaultOpponentName: Default name used for opponent team in match setup

_notes.primaryColor: Main theme color (hex, rgb, or named color)
_notes.secondaryColor: Secondary color for contrast and accents
_notes.logoUrl: Path or URL to team logo image
_notes.faviconUrl: Path or URL to favicon image
_notes.appIconUrl: Path or URL to PWA app icon (512x512 recommended)

pwa.description: Football match tracker for Your Team Name

_notes.appName: Full application name for PWA manifest
_notes.shortName: Short name for PWA (12 characters or less recommended)
_notes.description: App description for PWA manifest and app stores
_notes.themeColor: Theme color for PWA (matches primaryColor typically)
_notes.backgroundColor: Background color for PWA splash screen

integrations._description: External service integrations and API configurations

_notes.enabled: Set to false to disable league table features
_notes.defaultUrl: Default league table URL (users can override in UI)
_notes.corsProxies: List of CORS proxy services for accessing league data

_notes.enabled: Set to false to disable statistics features
_notes.apiEndpoint: API endpoint for statistics service (null = not configured)

_notes.matchDuration: Default match duration in seconds (5400 = 90 minutes)

storage._description: Local storage configuration and key prefixes

_notes.keyPrefix: Prefix for localStorage keys (prevents conflicts between teams)
_notes.cachePrefix: Prefix for cache storage keys (service worker caching)

_setup_instructions.1: Customize the 'team' section with your team's information
_setup_instructions.2: Update 'branding' section with your team's colors and logo URLs
_setup_instructions.3: Modify 'pwa' section to reflect your team's app name and description
_setup_instructions.4: Configure 'integrations' with your league's specific URLs and settings
_setup_instructions.5: Adjust 'defaults' to match your typical match duration and preferences
_setup_instructions.6: Update 'storage' prefixes to be unique for your team (use team abbreviation)
_setup_instructions.7: Remove all '_comment', '_description', '_notes', and '_setup_instructions' sections before deployment

_validation_notes.colors: Colors must be valid CSS colors (hex like #ff0000, rgb like rgb(255,0,0), or named colors like 'red')
_validation_notes.urls: URLs can be relative (./logo.png) or absolute (https://example.com/logo.png)
_validation_notes.prefixes: Storage prefixes should be unique and end with underscore for clarity
_validation_notes.numbers: Match duration should be in seconds (90 minutes = 5400 seconds)
